alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 8:37AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of western Bladen, Robeson, western Columbus, southeastern Florence, northeastern Georgetown, central Dillon, Horry, Marion and eastern Williamsburg Counties through 900 AM EST... At 835 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and thunderstorms from near Minturn to near Friendfield to near Eadytown. Movement was east at 40 to 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Conway, Marion, Dillon, Whiteville, Mullins, Socastee, Red Hill, Horry, Pembroke, Fairmont, Tabor City, Loris and Chadbourn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building until this line of storms passes.
